commit.message:
ExplicitBeanInfo.java: Explicitely import java.awt.Image.

2004-10-16  Michael Koch  <konqueror@gmx.de>

	* gnu/java/beans/ExplicitBeanInfo.java:
	Explicitely import java.awt.Image.
	(getIcon): Fixed off-by-one error.

From-SVN: r89148
